1.name: 1. Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
1.description: An unhinged American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

2.name: 2. Bewitched
2.description: A witch married to an ordinary man cannot resist using her magic powers to solve the problems her family faces.

3.name: 3. Mary Poppins
3.description: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

4.name: 4. Gilligan's Island
4.description: Four men and three women are stranded on an uncharted island following a torrential storm.

5.name: 5. The Man from U.N.C.L.E.
5.description: The two top Agents of the United Network Command for Law and Enforcement (U.N.C.L.E.) fight the enemies of peace, particularly the forces of T.H.R.U.S.H.

6.name: 6. A Fistful of Dollars
6.description: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.

7.name: 7. Goldfinger
7.description: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

8.name: 8. The Addams Family
8.description: The misadventures of a blissfully macabre but extremely loving family.

9.name: 9. Topkapi
9.description: A conman gets mixed up with a group of thieves who plan to rob an Istanbul museum to steal a jewelled dagger.

10.name: 10. The Munsters
10.description: A family of friendly monsters have misadventures, never quite understanding why people react to them so strangely.

11.name: 11. The Americanization of Emily
11.description: An American Naval Officer's talent for living the good life in wartime is challenged when he falls in love and is sent on a dangerous mission.

12.name: 12. Onibaba
12.description: Two women kill samurai and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.

13.name: 13. My Fair Lady
13.description: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make a crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

14.name: 14. Marnie
14.description: Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.

15.name: 15. Zulu
15.description: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.

16.name: 16. Another World
16.description: The life in the Midwestern town of Bay City, and the love, loss, trials, and triumph of its residents, who come from different backgrounds and social circles.

17.name: 17. Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
17.description: The submarine Seaview is commissioned to investigate the mysteries of the seas. Usually it finds more problems than answers.

18.name: 18. Daniel Boone
18.description: Frontier hero Daniel Boone conducts surveys and expeditions around Boonesborough, running into both friendly and hostile Indians, before, during, and even after the Revolutionary War.

19.name: 19. Les parapluies de Cherbourg
19.description: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

20.name: 20. A Hard Day's Night
20.description: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live TV performance.

21.name: 21. Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
21.description: The misadventures of a bumbling U.S. Marine named Gomer Pyle.

22.name: 22. The Night of the Iguana
22.description: An ostracized Episcopal clergyman leads a busload of middle-aged Baptist women on a tour of the Mexican coast and comes to terms with the failure haunting his life.

23.name: 23. Woman in the Dunes
23.description: An entomologist on vacation is trapped by local villagers into living with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.

24.name: 24. Fail Safe
24.description: A technical malfunction sends American planes to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack. Can all-out war be averted?

25.name: 25. Zorba the Greek
25.description: A reserved English writer travelling to Crete on a matter of business finds his life changed forever when he meets the gregarious Alexis Zorba.
